alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 7:20PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD... SOUTHEASTERN WHITMAN AND NORTH CENTRAL ASOTIN COUNTIES... At 719 PM PST, an area of heavy snow was located 12 miles east of Pomeroy, or 14 miles northwest of Clarkston, moving north at 10 mph. Locations impacted include... Mayview. This includes U.S. Highway 12 in Washington between mile markers 414 and 424. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
